crops.name: Lettuce (indoors)
crops.tips: Start indoors in a warm, sunny spot. Transplant outdoors once temperatures rise above 10Â°C. Space plants 20-25 cm apart.

crops.name: Spinach (indoors)
crops.tips: Spinach grows well in cooler temperatures. Ensure good drainage and indirect sunlight. Space plants 15 cm apart.

crops.name: Carrot (indoors)
crops.tips: Carrots need well-drained, loose soil. Start indoors in pots and transplant once conditions improve. Thin to 5 cm apart.

crops.name: Parsley
crops.tips: Parsley grows slowly, so start indoors. Use a moist, well-draining potting mix. Space plants 15 cm apart.

crops.name: Tomato (indoors)
crops.tips: Start seeds indoors under a grow light, 6-8 weeks before the last frost date. Space seedlings 50 cm apart.

crops.name: Pepper (indoors)
crops.tips: Peppers need a warm environment to germinate. Use a heat mat to ensure consistent warmth. Transplant after the last frost.

crops.name: Cucumber (indoors)
crops.tips: Start indoors in pots and transplant after the last frost. Keep them in a sunny location. Space 30-40 cm apart.

crops.name: Leek
crops.tips: Leeks require deep, well-drained soil. Start indoors and transplant when they are around 15 cm tall. Space 25 cm apart.

crops.name: Lettuce
crops.tips: Direct sow outdoors or transplant seedlings started indoors. Prefers cool, well-drained soil. Space plants 20 cm apart.

crops.name: Radish
crops.tips: Sow directly outdoors in early spring. Needs light, well-drained soil. Space seeds 2 cm apart.

crops.name: Carrot
crops.tips: Sow directly in the garden in loose, sandy soil. Space seeds 2 cm apart and thin to 5 cm after germination.

crops.name: Spinach
crops.tips: Sow directly outdoors in early spring. Prefers slightly acidic soil and cool weather. Space seeds 20 cm apart.

crops.name: Peas
crops.tips: Peas thrive in cool conditions. Sow directly outdoors in well-drained soil. Space seeds 5 cm apart.

crops.name: Potatoes
crops.tips: Plant seed potatoes in well-drained, fertile soil. Space 30 cm apart. Harvest when plants start to yellow.

crops.name: Beetroot
crops.tips: Direct sow in well-drained, fertile soil. Space seeds 5 cm apart and thin to 10 cm after germination.

crops.name: Onions
crops.tips: Plant onion sets or seeds in loose, fertile soil. Space sets 10 cm apart.

crops.name: Broccoli
crops.tips: Start seeds indoors and transplant once the seedlings are large enough. Space plants 30 cm apart.

crops.name: Cabbage
crops.tips: Start indoors and transplant after 4-6 weeks. Prefers cool weather. Space plants 30-40 cm apart.

crops.name: Sweet Corn
crops.tips: Direct sow in warm soil. Needs full sun and fertile, well-drained soil. Space plants 30 cm apart.

crops.name: Zucchini
crops.tips: Sow directly in the garden. Needs full sun and fertile soil. Space plants 40 cm apart.

crops.name: Pumpkin
crops.tips: Plant in rich, well-drained soil with plenty of sunlight. Space plants 80 cm apart.

crops.name: Beans
crops.tips: Sow directly outdoors in well-drained soil. Space seeds 5 cm apart and thin to 20 cm.

crops.name: Basil
crops.tips: Plant in warm, sunny locations with well-drained soil. Space plants 30 cm apart.

crops.name: Endive
crops.tips: Direct sow in loose, well-drained soil. Space seeds 20 cm apart. Prefers cool temperatures.

crops.name: Chicory
crops.tips: Sow directly outdoors in moist, well-drained soil. Space plants 25 cm apart.

crops.name: Kohlrabi
crops.tips: Sow directly outdoors in well-drained soil. Space plants 15 cm apart.

crops.name: Cauliflower
crops.tips: Start indoors and transplant once seedlings are large enough. Space plants 40 cm apart.

crops.name: Fennel
crops.tips: Sow directly in fertile, well-drained soil. Needs full sun. Space plants 30 cm apart.

crops.name: Spinach (autumn crop)
crops.tips: Direct sow outdoors for an autumn harvest. Prefers cooler weather. Space seeds 20 cm apart.

crops.name: Carrots (autumn crop)
crops.tips: Direct sow outdoors in well-drained soil. Space seeds 2 cm apart and thin to 5 cm.

crops.name: Turnips
crops.tips: Sow directly in loose, fertile soil. Space seeds 5 cm apart and thin to 10 cm after germination.

crops.name: Chard
crops.tips: Direct sow in well-drained, fertile soil. Space seeds 10 cm apart and thin to 30 cm after germination.

crops.name: Chinese Cabbage
crops.tips: Direct sow in fertile, well-drained soil. Needs cool temperatures. Space plants 30 cm apart.

crops.name: Winter Radish
crops.tips: Direct sow outdoors in well-drained soil. Space seeds 2 cm apart and thin to 5 cm.

crops.name: Beetroot (late crop)
crops.tips: Direct sow for a late autumn harvest. Space seeds 5 cm apart.

crops.name: Garlic
crops.tips: Plant garlic cloves in fertile, well-drained soil. Space cloves 15 cm apart. Harvest in late spring.

crops.name: Onions (overwintering)
crops.tips: Plant onion sets in loose, well-drained soil. Space sets 10 cm apart.

crops.name: Spinach (winter crop)
crops.tips: Sow in well-drained soil for a winter harvest. Prefers cooler temperatures.

crops.name: Lamb's Lettuce
crops.tips: Sow directly in fertile soil. Space plants 10 cm apart.

crops.name: Broad Beans (overwintering)
crops.tips: Sow directly outdoors for a spring harvest. Space seeds 5 cm apart.

crops.name: Peas (overwintering)
crops.tips: Sow in well-drained soil for an early spring harvest.

crops.name: Winter Lettuce
crops.tips: Sow in well-drained soil for a winter crop. Prefers cool temperatures.

crops.name: Garlic (late)
crops.tips: Plant cloves in fertile soil for a summer harvest. Space cloves 15 cm apart.

crops.name: Broad Beans (late)
crops.tips: Plant beans in well-drained soil for an early spring harvest.

crops.name: Lamb's Lettuce
crops.tips: Sow directly in fertile, moist soil. Space plants 10 cm apart.

crops.name: Winter Lettuce (indoors)
crops.tips: Start indoors in a cool, bright location. Space plants 20 cm apart.

crops.name: Parsley (indoors)
crops.tips: Grow indoors in moist, well-draining soil. Space plants 15 cm apart.

crops.name: Spinach (indoors)
crops.tips: Plant in a cool location with indirect light. Space plants 20 cm apart.
